label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_001
content:

- Detected one break-glass login outside maintenance window; validated change ticket and added note to audit trail.

- RBAC policy update: tightened 'Support-ReadOnly' scope to exclude payroll attributes.

### On Call
